entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
